#include <cstdio>
using namespace std;
int n1,n2,pom,pom2,a,b,carry;
int main (){

 while (true){
  carry=0;
  pom2=0;
  scanf("%d %d",&a,&b);
  if ((a==0) and (b==0)) break;
  pom=1;
  while (pom>0){
   n1=a/pom % 10;
   n2=b/pom % 10;
   if (n1+n2+pom2>=10) {carry++;pom2=1;}
    else pom2=0;
   pom*=10;
  }
  if (carry==0) printf("No carry operation.\n");
   else if (carry == 1) printf("1 carry operation.\n");
         else printf("%d carry operations.\n",carry);
 }
return 0;
}
